description: Fix volume filter bug - min_volume and max_volume parameters are not being sent to the API

userStories.title: Add volume parameters to API query string
userStories.description: As a user, I want my volume filter inputs to be sent to the API so that items are actually filtered by volume.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/hooks/use-items.ts, add min_volume to buildQueryString: if (p.min_volume !== undefined) searchParams.set('min_volume', String(p.min_volume))
In frontend/hooks/use-items.ts, add max_volume to buildQueryString: if (p.max_volume !== undefined) searchParams.set('max_volume', String(p.max_volume))
Volume parameters appear in network requests when filter values are entered
Large numbers like 10000000 are sent correctly (not as scientific notation)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill: enter min_volume=10000000  and min_volume=500 confirm filtered results. Click on any of the modal and check whether the daily limit reflects the filtering
userStories.notes: Volume parameters now sent to API. Verified with browser testing - min_volume=500 and max_volume=10000000 correctly filter results.
